amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a gender analysis of the IMET programs and to offer training on gender analysis to partner military personnel participating in IMET programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to conduct a gender analysis of the IMET programs and to offer training on gender analysis to partner military personnel participating in IMET programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A022) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 329).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A022) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Speier.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A022) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 329).
